name: Classic Vanilla Cake
description: Delight in the timeless elegance of our Classic Vanilla Cake. Moist and tender, with a rich vanilla flavor that enchants the palate with every bite.
recipe:
1.Add flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, vanilla extract and salt in a large bowl and mix
2.Add eggs, milk and mix with low speed
3.Mix till smooth and insert batter in heated pan
4.Bake the cake within 40 minutes until golden
5.Remove from the oven and allow to cool for about 10 minutes
6.Apply frosting with Vanilla Frosting

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Indulge in the rich, velvety decadence of our Chocolate Cake. Made with premium cocoa and a blend of fine ingredients, this cake is a true celebration of chocolate.
recipe:
1.Add flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, vanilla extract, cocoa powder and salt in a large bowl and mix
2.Add eggs, milk and mix with low speed
3.Mix till smooth and insert batter in heated pan
4.Bake the cake within 50 minutes until golden
5.Remove from the oven and allow to cool for about 10 minutes,
6.Apply frosting with Chocolate Frosting

name: Lemon Cake
description: Savor the bright and zesty flavors of our Lemon Cake. Made with fresh lemon juice and zest, this cake is a refreshing treat that is perfect for any occasion.
recipe:
1.Add flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, vanilla extract and salt in a large bowl and mix
2.Add eggs, milk, lemon zest and mix with low speed
3.Mix till smooth and insert batter in heated pan
4.Bake the cake between 30-50 minutes until golden
5.Remove from the oven and allow to cool for about 10 minutes
6.Apply frosting with Lemon Frosting
